name: Courtyard Manchester-Boston Regional Airport

reviews.title: Loved it!!
reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel on 08-07. I loved it. My room was on the third floor. I spent most of the evening on the balcony watching the airplanes take-off and land at the nearby Manchester airport. (not all rooms have balconies) you can ask if one is available. The Mall and Wal-Mart is close by. The hotel has an indoor pool. Airport service is also provided. The room was clean, the bathroom was spotless, no mold, no odor, It was fabulous.

reviews.title: Solid, Reliable Courtyard by Marriott
reviews.text: This property is a typical Courtyard with the typical layout and design of three floors with an indoor pool/jacuzzi and limited (but hearty) breakfast offerings. Rooms are the standard bed with a desk and rolling chair, plus an armchair or sofa. Marriott's standard matresses and beddings are not the most comfortable (Westin's Heavenly Bed comers to mind). The hotel staff is very friendly and allowed for liberal use of the hotel van for trips to the surrounding area, such as the Mall of New Hampshire, church, and bus station.

A predictable Courtyard, but clean and recently refurbished. Plentiful free parking and convenient access to malls and restaurants. You can hear the airport, however, but it is quite bearable. I've stayed here twice and found it very suitable for my business needs.
reviews.title: Reliable Hotel - Nicely Maintained

reviews.text: We stayed here for one night, after seeing a concert at the Verizon Wireless Arena. The hotel is located in a convenient area, with the Mall of New Hampshire and several stores almost next door. The room itself was very clean and comfortable, as with most Courtyard locations. The hotel also features an indoor pool and whirlpool, and there was also a life guard at the pool when we were there.
reviews.title: Close to Everything
Nice place
reviews.text: The hotel also has a hot breakfast buffet available for an additional charge. The breakfast was very good and well worth the extra charge.

reviews.title: A nicely refurbished hotel
reviews.text: I would not hestiate to stay here again on future trips to Manchester.

My parents stayed here for 2 nights over Easter weekend. The hotel is completing some renovations. As expected, the room was commodious with high ceilings, and all furnishings were in excellent condition. Everything was clean as can be and worked fine. Desk clerks were young but friendly. There's plenty of parking and an airport shuttle is available.
